name: Metropolis
description: An abstract landscape made using time as a texture. Part of the series “The Universe In A Slit” which uses slit-scan and 3D visualization to generate surreal worlds from old classic movies. The film's basic structure is used as ink for creating new visual possibilities. Size: 1080x1920px. - The slit-scan was taken from a scene from the 1927 movie Metropolis directed by Fritz Lang. - My contribution to #OBJKT4OBJKT 2021
